english: Good morning, everyone.
How can I help you?
Can we schedule a meeting?
I need to check my email.
arabic: أحتاج إلى التحقق من بريدي الإلكتروني.

english: The report is due tomorrow.
Please send me the document.
I will call you back later.
Can you please provide an update?
Let's take a break.
The meeting will start at 10 AM.
I need to finish this task by today.
arabic: أحتاج إلى إنهاء هذه المهمة اليوم.

english: Can you help me with this project?
arabic: هل يمكنك مساعدتي في هذا المشروع؟

english: I have a question about the report.
Where is the meeting room?
I am working on the presentation.
Can you review this document?
The deadline is next week.
I will send you the details.
Let's discuss this in the meeting.
Please print out the report.
I am available for a call at 2 PM.
arabic: أنا متاح للمكالمة في الساعة 2 مساءً.

english: Could you send me the latest version?
arabic: هل يمكنك إرسال النسخة الأحدث لي؟

english: I need to discuss something important.
Let's finalize the plan.
I will update you on the progress.
Can you arrange a meeting with the team?
arabic: هل يمكنك ترتيب اجتماع مع الفريق؟

english: I will be out of the office tomorrow.
Let's brainstorm some ideas.
I will take care of it.
Can you forward this email to everyone?
arabic: هل يمكنك إعادة توجيه هذا البريد الإلكتروني للجميع؟

english: We need to complete this by the end of the day.
arabic: نحتاج إلى إكمال هذا بحلول نهاية اليوم.

english: The client is asking for an update.
Please make sure to attend the meeting.
I will prepare the agenda.
Can you please clarify this point?
I need more information about this project.
arabic: أحتاج إلى المزيد من المعلومات حول هذا المشروع.

english: Let's meet in my office.
I have an important meeting in the morning.
Please let me know if you have any questions.
arabic: يرجى إخباري إذا كان لديك أي أسئلة.

english: I will send you the presentation slides.
Can you update the spreadsheet?
